description: This Dart source file defines a mock database class for an expense tracker application. It includes seed data, data structures for users, accounts, categories, transactions, budgets, goals, and alerts. The class provides various methods to seed data, create, update, delete transactions, budgets, goals, and retrieve dashboard summaries and breakdowns. It is used for demo mode to simulate database interactions with in-memory data.

classes.name: MockDB
classes.description: A singleton class providing in-memory mock data and methods for an expense tracker app, suitable for demo mode.

methods.name: seedIfNeeded
methods.description: Seeds mock transactions and recomputes budget spent values if not already seeded.

methods.name: monthlyTotals
methods.description: Calculates total income, expenses, and net for a given month and year.

methods.name: categoryBreakdown
methods.description: Provides expenses grouped by category for a specific month, sorted descending.

methods.name: dashboard
methods.description: Returns dashboard data including totals, budgets, top categories, and recent months' data.

methods.name: createTransaction
methods.description: Creates a new transaction entry and updates budgets accordingly.

methods.name: deleteTransaction
methods.description: Deletes a transaction by ID and updates budgets.

methods.name: updateTransaction
methods.description: Updates existing transaction details and recalculates budgets.

methods.name: createBudget
methods.description: Adds a new budget category with a limit.

methods.name: markAlertRead
methods.description: Marks a specific alert as read.
